location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Responsible for leading the Process Excellence (PX) strategy within the CX division, including process quality control, process improvement, operational optimization and knowledge management for both AI Chatbot and Customer Service. This role focuses on standardization, measurement, automation and continuous improvement to enhance internal operational efficiency and the overall customer experience Job Description: Process Governance & Standardization Develop, standardize and manage end-to-end SOPs/Workflows for customer service. Establish a Process Governance Framework (policies, checklists, control points) and manage change control. Process Knowledge and Automation Management Manage the lifecycle of process documentation, including version control, approval, release and change tracking. Build and maintain the knowledge linkage structure (metadata, related structure) to support CS, AI Chatbot in applying the correct processes. Ensure process alignment and synchronization across PX, CS, AI, CRM and QA teams to maintain consistent responses. Cross-Functional Coordination and Change Management Execute change management activities, including communication of changes, rapid training, monitoring adoption levels and measuring implementation rates. Report customer and CS insights and feedback gathered during process implementation. Requirements: Minimum of 3 years of experience in Process, Project or Risk Management roles. Strong data analysis and problem-solving skills. Logical thinking with a continuous improvement mindset and data-driven decision-making. Proficiency in Google Docs, Sheets, CRM systems, or similar tools (required). Experience in process automation.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Are you ready to build the future of speech recognition technology? At NVIDIA, we are seeking an exceptionally dedicated Intern AI Engineer to join our team in Vietnam. This role provides a special opportunity to work on groundbreaking AI projects specifically dedicated to Vietnamese and other Asian languages. As a member of our top-tier team, you will be immersed in an environment that fosters creativity, diversity, and teamwork. What You'll Be Doing Developing and refining speech recognition models for Vietnamese and additional languages from the Asian region, such as Japanese, Korean, and Mandarin. Collaborating with multi-functional teams to identify user needs and effectively implement solutions. Working closely with senior engineers to integrate speech recognition features into our products. Participating in research endeavors passionate about improving the precision and efficiency of voice recognition algorithms. Testing and debugging to ensure flawless performance in real-world scenarios. What We Need To See Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. Strong programming skills in Python, C++, or equivalent languages. Proven understanding of machine learning principles and techniques. Familiarity with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch. Ability to work collaboratively in a diverse team environment. Strong problem-solving skills and a focus on detail. Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd Proficiency in Japanese or Korean is considered a huge advantage. Experience with NVIDIA's NeMo platform is an advanced skill. Previous experience in speech recognition projects. Demonstrated ability to compete and succeed in ambitious environments. JR2008038

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Company Description Mi ndlab AI is a technology-driven company specializing in creating transformative artificial intelligence solutions. Founded by a team of 20 innovative visionaries, the company is at the forefront of redefining the global experience of AI. With a focus on innovation and collaboration, Mindlab AI develops cutting-edge technologies that empower businesses and communities. Join us in pushing the boundaries of AI innovation and making a tangible impact worldwide. Position type: Contractor I. KEY JOB DUTIES Requirement Analysis: Review and analyze business software specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria provided by the Product Owner to design comprehensive test plans. Test Execution: Design test cases and conduct functional, regression, integration, and UI/UX testing for mobile applications. Collaboration: Partner with the Development Team during project planning and solution testing to identify problems and recommend improvements. Defect Management: Identify, report, and track bugs via Jira/Trello; provide clear documentation for developers to reproduce issues. User Support: Support the team in user training and ensure the final product aligns with user requirements. II. EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENT / SKILLS / ABILITIES 1â€“2 years of experience in Manual Testing, with a strong focus on Mobile Apps (iOS & Android). Proficient in designing test cases, executing functional/regression tests, and managing bug lifecycles via Jira/Trello. Strong hands-on experience with Postman for API testing. Ability to analyze complex requirements and propose effective, value-driven testing approaches. English proficiency to read technical documentation and communicate within a global environment. High attention to detail, proactive problem-solving, and a strong "quality-first" mindset. Preferred: Familiarity with AI automation tools, plus a strong learning mindset to explore and test emerging AI solutions. III. WHY YOUâ€™LL LOVE WORKING HERE Attractive salary for contractors with performance-based review. Work on cutting-edge AI products that impact users globally. Opportunity to collaborate with international teams and improve your English skills daily. A professional, dynamic, and open-minded working environment. IV. FURTHER INFORMATION Working hour: from Monday to Friday (8:30 -18:00) (FULL TIME ONSITE) Address: 10th floor, Ha Do Airport Building, 2 Hong Ha Street, Tan Son Hoa Ward, Ho Chi Minh City (formerly Ward 2, Tan Binh District)

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Department: Product (Furniture) Location: Ho Chi Minh City Compensation: â‚«38,000,000 - â‚«53,800,000 / month Description Hi there, weâ€™re Article. ðŸ‘‹ Weâ€™re a North American-based furniture company creating remarkably better furniture experiences one sofa at a time. As the Project Manager at Article, you will play a crucial role in managing and steering the success of operational projects and investment projects across the organization. Why We Need You: In the Project Management Office (PMO) team, your responsibilities will span the entire project lifecycle, from initiation and planning through to execution, closure, and subsequent post-project analysis. Additionally, you will cultivate and maintain strong relationships with all the internal and external suppliers, playing a crucial role in the successful delivery of high-impact, cross-functional projects. You will be managing million dollar new product introduction projects that expand Article's catalogue and product offering to our customers under the Assortment Program. Why Article? What started in 2019 as a project to strengthen our relationships with our Asian vendors has grown into a permanent operation in Ho Chi Minh City. Article currently has â‰ˆ70 employees in Vietnam, across our Sourcing, Technical Product Development, Quality, HR, Logistics, PMO and Accounting functions. As a Particle (people of Article), you will have a high level of autonomy to solve challenging, meaningful problems the best way you can. That means youâ€™re trusted to explore solutions you believe will work best (youâ€™re the expert, after all). Youâ€™ll do all this while growing your skills within a company that is redefining the furniture industry. At Article, we grow and have fun together through regular in-office training and team activities. These moments help us build connection, collaboration, and creativity across our teams all year long. What Youâ€™ll Do: Youâ€™ll be part of a team of 7 Project Managers and Project Owners to develop detailed plans to meet their specific project objectives, and actively manage and report on any deviations in project timelines and budgets. Lead the planning, execution, monitoring and closure of cross-functional projects that support the internal customersâ€™ organizational goals and objectives. Identify, assess, and track project risks, collaborating with internal and external cross-functional suppliers to develop and implement effective mitigation strategies. Monitor project timelines and milestones using project management tools (eg. Wrike) to ensure all projects are delivered on time and within scope. Conduct root cause analysis for issues identified during project execution and consult on corrective actions undertaken by internal functional suppliers to address and improve overall project performance. Manage changes to project scope, schedule, and budget baselines ensuring continuous communication and alignment with all relevant cross-functional project team members. Establish and maintain strong working relationships with internal customers and suppliers to understand their needs and constraints. Conduct post-project retrospectives to capture lessons learned, enabling continuous improvement of PMO best practices and facilitating identification of improvement opportunities for cross-functional teams. Analyze and report on project variance and other performance metrics to assess and communicate project health. Develop comprehensive project status reports, maintaining transparency and providing timely updates to all stakeholders. Whatâ€™s next: If youâ€™re selected to proceed in the interview process, youâ€™ll receive emails directly from Article (email domains @article.com, article@pinpoint.email) and not through VietnamWorks Who You Are: 2-5 years in Project Management, Change management and/or Process Engineering experience Bachelorâ€™s degree in any discipline. Preferred: Business Administration, Project/Operations Management, or a related field PMP or similar project management certification preferred In-depth knowledge of project management methodologies (Agile and Waterfall), tools, and best practices Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously Advanced problem-solving and analytical skills Advanced skills in Project Management Tools (Eg: Wrike, MS Project) Perks & Benefits: Wealth, Health & Life: Salary range: 38,000,000 - 53,800,000 VNÄ Gross/Month 13th-month salary 15 days of vacation* 11 National Holidays 2 extra days (Christmas & 1 day of your choosing) 6 well-being (sick) days* Excellent extended health care benefits packages (dental, health check, mental healthâ€¦ Growth & Training: We believe in fostering an environment of learning and growth at Article. Every role has a clear growth path that you and your manager create together, so you know what development looks like for you. Throughout the year, we have several in-office training sessions covering a range of topics. Youâ€™ll also have access to many learning and development modules through our internal online learning platform. Other: Employee discounts on many of our products produced in Vietnam. Company & Office Space: Our modern office is in Thao Dien, with first-come, first-served (limited) secure scooter parking. State-of-the-art laptops with the tech and tools to easily collaborate. Be a part of a multinational, collaborative office culture. Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Hiring: At Article, we value authenticity and transparency in our hiring process. We want to get to know the real you, not an AI-generated version. Here are some guidelines around Artificial Intelligence in Hiring and what we expect from you. From us, you can expect that humans will carefully review every application. We do not use artificial intelligence or ranking algorithms in our hiring decisions. Criminal Background Checks: Having a criminal record does not restrict your employment at Article. Criminal background checks are only conducted with your permission and after a conditional employment offer has been accepted. The decision if a criminal record will restrict your employment will be made on a case-by-case basis, where we conduct an "individualized assessment"â€”a reasoned, evidence-based determination as to whether the applicant's past conviction has a direct and adverse relationship with the specific job duties of the position. Work Authorization: Unless otherwise stated, all open roles require legal authorization to work in the location where the job is based, without requiring VISA sponsorship. For US-based roles, Article participates in E-Verify Be Aware of Scam Jobs/ Recruitment Fraud: Click here for more information on Scam Jobs . If you receive a suspicious message or job offer claiming to be from Article, please do not engage. Forward the message to careers@article.com so we can investigate. Equal Opportunity Statement: At Article, we value and respect individuals for their different talents, skills, abilities, and unique contributions. Employment decisions are based on merit and business needs, and not on race, ethnic origin, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, family status, disability, genetic characteristics, personal beliefs, or any other classification protected by federal, state, provincial, and local laws and ordinances. Accommodations: Reasonable accommodations are related to a disability or another protected characteristic. Applicants can also request accommodation at any stage of the recruitment process by notifying the hiring team or emailing ta.accommodation@article.com. This email is dedicated to accommodation requests onlyâ€”non-related messages will not receive a response.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: FPT Software, a subsidiary of FPT Corporation, is a global technology and IT services provider headquartered in Vietnam, with $1 billion in revenue (2023) and over 30,000 employees in 30 countries. Job Summary We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Engineer with strong proficiency in Python to join our growing data team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines and infrastructure to support analytics, machine learning, and business intelligence initiatives. Job Qualifications: Strong programming skills in Python for data engineering tasks. Experience with SQL and relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle). Familiarity with data pipeline orchestration tools (e.g., Airflow, Prefect, Luigi). Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and cloud-native data services. Knowledge of data modeling, data warehousing, and data lake concepts. Proficiency in working with structured and unstructured data. Experience with version control systems like Git. Good in English communication Preferred Qualifications: Bachelorâ€™s or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Experience with big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop). Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes). Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. Understanding of data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) Benefits: Get involve in major full-cycle projects with large scale and opportunities to work directly with specialists and experts in Data Industry. â€œFPT careâ€ health insurance is provided by PTI and is exclusive for FPT employees. Company shuttle buses provide a convenient way of transportation for all employees. Annual Summer Vacation: following the companyâ€™s policy and starts from May every year. Other allowances: transportation support by company bus, lunch allowance, working onsite allowance, etc. plus company support for housing in District 9. F-Town Campus provides many facilities for FPT Software employees such as a football ground, basketball & volleyball, gym center, cafeteria, etc. Contact point: ðŸš¨nhunlq2@fpt.com âœ…0902 546 022 (zalo/whatsapp)

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." We've assessed over 1 billion consumers across four countries, and we're on a mission to provide 100 million credit lines using the power of AI and Big Data. How You'll Make An Impact Are you a highly qualified and curious Computer Vision Mlops Engineer ready to build cutting-edge digital identity verification products? Join our dynamic team, where you'll develop and deploy novel machine learning solutions that directly impact our eKYC (electronic Know Your Customer) projects. If you're passionate about leveraging computer vision to solve real-world problems and enhance digital security in a company with a strong social mission, this role is for you! What You'll Do We are looking for qualified MLOps Engineer for the eKYC project, who will help us build up our digital identity verification products. Your Primary Focus Will Be MLOps: Apply MLOps techniques to optimize the AI model development process such as model serving, data/model versioning, autoML, and so on. Developing and managing the backend system which encapsulates and provides control flow of various ML models. Monitor and optimize system performance and resource consumption. Integrate ML models and ensure consistency in model interfaces and interaction as per product requirements. Act as interfaces between product team, engineering team, data science and infrastructure teams to ensure smooth integration of ML solutions. Modeling: Developing various ML models in the field of computer vision and implementing novel solutions for diverse ML problems (supervised, semi-supervised, unsupervised, one-class). Optimize and deploy "tiny" ML solutions on limited computation power devices such as mobile devices and web platforms. What We're Looking For BS/MS in computer science or related fields Having 1 years of experience in Data science and MLOps Must be proficient in software design and software development. Must be proficient in Python, scripting language. Experience with other programming languages (C++, Java, Javascript ...) is a plus Must be proficient in Linux system, version control system (Git), virtualization and SW packaging tool (docker) Great communication skills Desired Skills: Experience with ML framework: Tensorflow, Pytorch, Mxnet, ONNX, Pandas, Numpy, kuberflow pipeline, airflow Experience with managing data science and computer vision toolkit, such as JupyterHub, OpenCV... is a plus Experience with Cloud Storage, CICD/Github workflows and Triton server are big pluses Experience with working with databases and query language is a plus. Familiar with MLOPs concept and toolkit is a plus Basic understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms BS/MS in Computer Science with focus on machine learning is a plus Your Growth Journey at Trusting Social Have An Opportunity To Work under supervision of experts/leaders with more than 15 years of experience Focus on your technical development skills and build the career in data science Experience diverse types of AI problems including detection, classification, regression, OCR, LLM, abnormal detection, NLP, generative models) Experience a practical AI development pipeline and monitor AI systems in production: business requirement analysis, problem clarification, solution design, implementation, AI system testing, deployment, system monitoring and analysis. Develop features for applications of digital identity verification products, fraud prevention, and anti-money laundering, which are hot topics in recent years. Learn from production across many nations (Vietnam, Philippines, India, Indonesia) Work closely with the product team, infrastructure team, engineering team Understand the other related areas. Improve your social skills including communication, negotiation, cross-team collaboration, self-awareness and so on. What We Offer Join our vibrant team and enjoy: Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses Comprehensive health care coverage for you and your dependents Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours Convenient central district 1 office location, next to a future metro station Onsite lunch with multiple options, including vegetarian Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations Fun and engaging team building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized An opportunity to make a social impact by helping to democratize credit access in emerging markets. At Trusting Social, we live by ownership, integrity, and agility in execution. We believe in doing what's right, what's best, and what's innovative. If you're smart, driven, and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology, come join our team. We offer the runway to truly make an impact. For more information about us and a look at our office and people, please visit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inAEDGvOcL8&t=29s

location: District 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Main Tasks Integrate models with a focus on product features and prioritization. Build and maintain software solutions and data processing pipelines Ensure correct integration of LLMs in terms of quality and costs effectifness Deploy models in production environments using cloud platforms (AWS) and containerization (Docker) Integrate CI/CD pipelines using Git and automated testing Collaborate with product stakeholders to define and prioritize requirements Document and communicate technical content clearly to non-technical stakeholders. Job Qualification Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or equivalent Minimum 3 years of professional experience in Software Development with focus on AI Products Experience in product-oriented software development (not research-focused) Ability to independently prioritize and implement requirements Willingness to participate in in-person meetings with local team members Hard Skills (must Have) Ability to explain complex technical content in a clear and understandable way Proactive problem-solving and independent prioritization of tasks Product and feature mindset: focus on implementation and value, not research. Python Ecosystem: Pandas, NumPy Data Processing: SQL, database design, ETL processes Cloud & Deployment: AWS, Docker Versioning & CI/CD: Git, automated pipelines Security: Basic knowledge of cloud security (IAM, access control).

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven User Acquisition (UA) Specialist to join our team, focusing on the growth and scalability of our mobile app. In this role, you will work closely with cross-functional teams to launch and scale new mobile apps profitably through organic and non-organic channels across the globe (US, Korea, Japan, etc.) What You Will Do Manage user acquisition (UA) campaigns across major platforms, including Google, Facebook, TikTok, and other leading ad networks (e.g., Applovin, Mintegral, etc.). Strong experience in ASO (App Store Optimization) is a must to maximize organic installs and improve overall app visibility. Analyze performance data from: (1) Market trends and competitor analysis, (2) Key ad campaign metrics (CPI, CTR, IR, ROI/ROAS, installs) (3) A/B testing of creatives to optimize user engagement and campaign efficiency, (4) Revenue and product metrics to understand user behavior and refine acquisition strategies for successful market penetration. Collaborate closely with the Creative team to provide actionable UA insights that optimize app creatives and improve product marketability. Work with global ad networks and vendors to optimize campaigns, ensuring best practices are adhered to, and identify new platforms to expand user acquisition inventories. Manage and optimize UA budgets to maximize ROI, ensuring efficient and effective user acquisition strategies for both short-term gains and long-term app growth. Qualifications 1-2 years of experience in Performance Marketing (Google, Facebook, TikTok, or other ad networks) with proven success in mobile app user acquisition. Being familiar with using mobile marketing attribution tool (e.g. Appsflyer or Adjust) In-app marketing experience for driving deeper conversions Data analysis, Strategic & Tactical planning, Problem solving Ability to multitask and manage deadlines in a cross-functional team, Stakeholder management A self-driven individual who takes full ownership and consistently delivers results A continuous learner, eager to stay ahead of mobile market trends and apply new insights to drive product success. Good communication (English writing and speaking skills) Possess a creative mindset and an instinct for identifying trends. Customer-oriented, Innovative, and emotional intelligence Resilient and adaptable to changes and uncertainties WILL BE A PLUS A passion for mobile apps and an understanding of app user behavior. Prior experience in mobile app industry Being comfortable with data and turning multiple sources of data into insights Entrepreneurial spirit: comfortable with uncertainties and changes in a fast-paced environment Fanatic learner: proactive learning and sharing knowledge What We Offer Competitive salary, 100% salary during probation Performance bonus with 30% of company profit shared with no cap Full SHUI as Vietnamese Law + Premium Private Medical Insurance and annual health check Minimum 12 days paid annual leave + 10 days paid sick leave. 12 days working from home per year Annual flexi-budget (9.400.000 VNÄ/year) for well-being & personal development Free daily lunch with 10+ menu options. Free daily F&B: Snacks, juice, beverage, tea-time Monthly/Bi-monthly team activity allowance Company learning trip will be top of countries that we gain most profit. 1st is Korea, next destination is Japan Sponsored sports activities: badminton, soccer, ... Sponsored overseas conferences and industry events for all levels. Modern equipments/AI tool provided. How To Apply? Click the button or contact us at [email protected] We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Before jumping into all the information about the role and what you can bring to the table, let us introduce ourselves real quick. About Us Insider One is the #1 platform that brings everything marketing and customer engagement teams need in one place so they can reach their peak potential and become unstoppable. Our story began with six desks and a vision to create a single platform to make industry-first technologies and emerging channels accessible to marketers worldwide. Today, Insider One is powered by 1,500+ team members representing 50+ nationalities across 30+ offices. With AI at its core and an integrated Customer Data Platform (CDP), Insider One unites data, personalization, and journey orchestration across the most extensive set of natively supported channels, including WhatsApp, SMS, Email, Web, App, and Site Search. We recently raised one of the largest funding rounds in the industry, a $500M Series E led by General Atlantic. We are backed by top-notch investors, including Sequoia Capital, QIA, Riverwood, and Endeavor Catalyst, and trusted by 2000+ customers from high-growth startups to the most prestigious Fortune 500 companies such as Samsung, Nike, Lâ€™Oreal, Singapore Airlines, NestlÃ©, Nissan, Lenovo, Puma, IKEA, Allianz, Domino's, and the list goes on. Insider One was congratulated for becoming one of the only woman-founded, women-led B2B SaaS unicorns in the world. Loved by customers, recognized by analysts, we are the only vendor recognized as the #1 leader in all the capabilities marketing and customer engagement teams need. Donâ€™t just take our word for it â€” see for yourself. We consistently outperform and continue our leadership, and the results speak for themselves. From day one, Insider Oneâ€™s mission has not only been to build a world-class product company, but also to create one of the most socially progressive technology communities in the world. Through our social responsibility initiatives like 100 Social Responsibility Projects, AI Training for Teachers, Code Academy, SheCodes, SheLeads, and SheMarkables , our community has committed to scaling its impact on our communities across 30+ countries, driving initiatives in health, education, farming, animal rights, and increasing womenâ€™s representation in STEM. Behind all these achievements is an exceptionally talented, visionary team of overachievers that moves fast and agile, creating cutting-edge products, and focuses on making an impact. If you want to be a part of this journey, just keep reading. First things first: What is this role about? Youâ€™re probably expecting an eye-catching, mesmerizing job description that will sweep you off your feet, flavored with the coolest startup jargon. After all, weâ€™re a Sequoia-backed company, with an awarded woman CEO and a team across the globe that takes the word â€œdiversityâ€ very seriously. But thatâ€™s exactly why we think that nothing says more than the real experience. Weâ€™re underdogs who believe in the power of actions more than anything else. And as a customer-first company, we always walk the extra mile. So we asked our team of Technical Support Specialists (TSS) to tell us what their day-to-day is really like and, in a nutshell, this is what they told us. Role Description As a Technical Support Specialist, you will play a crucial role in the Partner Success Team that owns support processes with our partners using our products and services. To be successful in this role you should be an excellent communicator who also has solid problem-solving skills. Your primary responsibility will be to support seamless experiences to our partners. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include troubleshooting technical issues, finding resolutions for partner requests, reviewing partner queries and finding creative solutions that streamline their requirements, and leveraging your knowledge to help partners get over technical struggles while expanding to the Insider platform. You will also contribute to building innovative products by advocating for partners by taking their feedback and sharing it with the Product team to improve processes and product offerings. Another important duty of yours will be meeting important SLAs like response time and the lead time for issue resolutions. What You Will Do A university degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related fields 1-2 years experience supporting a technical product, ideally in SaaS, or experience in MIS or Software Development teams Strong communication skills in writing (English) High sense of responsibility and accountability Ability to provide timely responses and follow up systematically A natural problem solver with a positive attitude and love for helping others succeed Good debugging/troubleshooting skills Knowledge of HTML, CSS, or other programming languages is a plus What You Will Need A university degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related fields To some extent, digital marketing (or related experience) in a customer-oriented position Show us that â€œyouâ€™ve got what it takesâ€ to collaborate and build strong visionary relationships with customers, especially at the executive level. Aka, your sharp business acumen Solid oral and written communication abilities, with positive and energetic phone skills and exquisite listening skills. Alas, weâ€™ve got clients all over the world! Be a self-motivated and savvy tech bug, always in search of new solutions and ideas to improve our relationship with our clients Cherish one of our core ethos: care. Youâ€™ll need to care for our clients and make sure they feel at home with our products and our assistance Superior project and time management skills. A keen eye for detail is a plus! Passion for testing, measuring, and improving outreach and follow-up effectiveness The ability and flexibility to work in a fast-paced startup environment Solid understanding of basic web concepts and digital marketing What We Offer Be part of a diverse team thatâ€™s as global as it gets â€” where every voice is heard and 50+ nationalities build together Level up with internal trainings covering AI fundamentals, coding, foreign languages, and a wide range of personal development skills Feed your curiosity with access to Spotify, LinkedIn Learning, Blinkist, MasterClass, and CloudGuru Become a Shareowner through our eligibility-based â€œESOPâ€ and own a piece of what you build Help build the team you want to work with and enjoy rewarding referral bonuses Opportunities to give back to your community through volunteering and purpose-driven social impact projects From global retreats to team-building activities, expect year-round events that turn into lifelong memories Get inspired by the greatest minds in the tech industry through events like our Tech & Dev Talks Was this position made for you? We aren't just hiring for a position; we are hiring for a mission â€” a mission to build a lasting legacy that will set the benchmark for the most progressive tech companies out there. To do this, we are looking for exceptional talent to join a community of good-hearted individuals who take high ownership and are relentlessly driven to go the extra mile. If this sounds like who you are and where you aspire to be, we are excited to meet you. We provide equal opportunity in a zero-discrimination workplace and not just welcome but also embrace everyone without regard to sex, race, color, nationality, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, citizenship, or marital status. Please follow Insider One on LinkedIn, Instagram, X, Facebook and Medium! We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: About Trusting Social At Trusting Social, we are at the forefront of the AI revolution, transforming the banking industry in Southeast Asia and India for the past decade. Now, we're pioneering Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) solutions, leveraging Generative AI technology to reimagine banking in a post-AGI world. Our mission is to spark the next revolution in productivity and customer experience, akin to the Internet and mobile computing breakthroughs. Join us in making financial freedom accessible to all. Position Overview We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Director of Product - Generative AI for Enterprise Customer Operations. In this role, you will lead the development of our flagship Generative AI product suite, transforming the banking and finance experience for billions of customers worldwide. If you are passionate about building world-changing products and never settle for second place, we invite you to join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence. Key Responsibilities Own the product vision and continuously refine our roadmap for developing Generative AI agents for banking and financial services. Be accountable for product expansion, revenue, and profitability plans. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize features that will deliver our vision. Develop and maintain a detailed product roadmap outlining key milestones and deliverables. Ensure the product meets the highest standards of quality and performance. Lead a team of product managers, developers, data scientists, and engineers to advance our market performance edge. Work with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful product launch and adoption. Monitor and analyze market trends and emerging technologies to keep our products competitive and cutting-edge. Establish metrics and goals for the product that align with the company's overall strategy. Must-Have Strategic reasoning grounded in facts and data, with a clear understanding of competitive advantage, market dynamics, and technological growth. Ability to zoom in on problems and pain points, and zoom out to maintain a clear picture of business impact and objectives. Exceptional problem-solving skills and the ability to derive key drivers from metrics. Mindfulness of the feelings, emotions, needs, and wants of customers and colleagues. 10+ years of experience in product management or senior leadership roles, with exposure to AI technologies. Excellent analytical and abstraction skills to break down complex problems. Exceptional communication skills for articulating complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and build strong relationships with stakeholders. Flexibility and adaptability to work in a fast-paced environment. Extreme ownership and a commitment to realizing the vision. Keen attention to detail and the ability to work well under pressure. Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge. Nice-to-Have Degree or strong experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or Consulting. Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially AI solutions. Proven experience in leading and growing a team to deliver successful products. Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics. What We Offer Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses. Comprehensive healthcare coverage for you and your dependents. Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours. Convenient central district 1 office location, next to a future metro station. Onsite lunch with diverse options, including vegetarian. Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations. Fun team-building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday. Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized. An opportunity to make a social impact by democratizing credit access in emerging markets. Our Values At Trusting Social, we value extreme ownership, data-driven approaches, mindfulness, and social impact. We are committed to pioneering AGI applications in the financial industry to create a more inclusive and equitable financial system. Our guiding principle for product development is discovering disruptive insights through collaboration with potential customers. Join us on this journey to leverage AGI to deliver financial freedom for everyone. Together, we can create a better future for all. Learn More About Us: Trusting Social on YouTube If you share our values and beliefs, we invite you to join us on our journey to deliver financial access at an unprecedented scale. Apply now to be part of the AGI revolution in banking.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: About Jeff Over2 billion people in Emerging Markets lack traditional financial data, and as a result are financially underserved. At the same time, these consumers have tremendous amount of digital footprint around them. Jeff is a financial technology startup that addresses this issue. We build financial product comparison marketplaces that help consumers and financial service providers connect and increase odds of cooperation through digital footprint-enabled data science and machine learning models. Our goal is to unlock financial services for the underbanked, with a clear focus on emerging economies that will drive the global economy in decades to come. Since 2020, our business has expanded to 6 countries, surpassed 10 million visits every month to our brands and reached profitability. Jeff has been recognized as a top growth fintech by Financial Times, Statista, Deloitte, Sifted and others. As we continue our growth and expansion, unlocking new markets and products, as well as introducing AI as a central product pillar, we are looking for great people to fortify our team further. Join our team as Marketing Manager for Asia and play a significant role scaling our business in the region 10->100! We are open-minded with regards to location but expect this role will involve time spent both in target markets, as well as in our HQ in Riga, Latvia on a regular basis. You will: Oversee and manage all marketing related activities across Philippines, Vietnam & later on in India Drive user growth rate Lead efforts towards improving our LTV/CAC Orchestrate actions to boost retention and funnel KPIs Be on a constant lookout for new growth avenues: channels, synergies, growth-hacks & more Coordinate efforts with colleagues in Performance, Lifecycle, SEO and design teams Closely cooperate with Data team, driving improvements via sophisticated data-centric tools and projects Be on top of all things brand, customer opinion and PR improvements Play increasingly important role with regards to scaling regional marketing team over time Take a big part in more deeply embedding AI in all things marketing: content, analytics, automations & more You have: 5+ years of hands-on experience in digital marketing Strong and demonstrated background in digital marketing, with clear distinction in select sub-areas of it Past experience with affiliate marketing or mobile app marketing at an advanced level is a clear advantage Prior experience in financial services, marketplace business or large-scale consumer tech companies Excellent English. Knowledge of Tagalog, Vietnamese or Hindi is a strong advantage Demonstrated ability of being a self-starter that thrives in dynamic, cross-market environment Extreme level of ownership Ability to fly high & fly low: zoom out and recalibrate the big picture, and then dive in and lead execution by example, repetitively and regularly Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal What's in it for you? Equipment of your preference Knowledgeable, driven and truly experienced team Vacation policy that fully covers annual leave and National holidays in line with your residence countryâ€™s standards Team building events, both online and offline Competitive salary, as well as opportunity to earn more via good performance (cash or stock - you chose!) Early-stage startup hunger and ambition combined with stability, as we have reached profitability High energy - as a growing startup, no day is the same Unlimited growth - as the company grows, you grow with us! ðŸš€ Our Values: Walk the talk: We not only understand what to do but are able to execute it Integrity: We are reliable, trustworthy, and accountable professionals who respect each other 10x Mentality: We tackle massive markets with bold ambition and solutions Action over perfection: We make informed decisions quickly and iterate as we go Always be solving, always be building: We are problem solvers, not just problem finders Own it: We take full responsibility for our work and ensure everything possible is done to deliver outcomes If you refer someone for this role and the person passes 3 month probation, you can earn USD 1'500 To refer someone, send your name, candidates LinkedIn URL and contact information to careers@jeff-app.com To avoid misunderstandings, the first 3 months is the period when we mutually and truly find out if it is a match - both in terms of values, as well as competences. Ready to change the way how people in the Emerging World obtain financial services? job_description: VinAI is one of the worldâ€™s top 20 Artificial Intelligence research-based companies developing world- class products and services. Our head office is located in Hanoi, Vietnam with additional technology hubs across the US and Australia. We have more than 200 research scientists and AI engineers dedicated to the mission of transforming our state-of-the-art AI research into technology solutions for Vietnam and the global market. Our key investor is Vingroup, one of the largest conglomerates in Asia. Software Engineer The ideal candidate will have proven ability to implement software application, strong programming skills, understand software development and software project management. You will join as a member of Software team and work on the project. We will develop an application, which lets drivers feel more comfortable and safe. What youâ€™ll do Work on real projects, meaningful and interesting work. Have a great learning experience with a humble, inspiring team. What youâ€™ll need. Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Automotive, Electrical, Communication or Computer Engineering 2+ years professional experience with Automotive/ Autonomous Driving System or Software Development 2+ years professional experience with SW development of mathematical concepts as well as algorithms 5+ years professional work experience with System Linux and/or Linux programming using C++ 5+ years professional work experience with embedded software development for safety critical systems (e.g., automotive, aerospace) using C++ Nice to Haveâ€™s Model based development skills using SysML and/or UML (ideally using Enterprise Architect) Experience in the development of embedded systems in POSIX-based OS, QNX or Classical AUTOSAR Knowledge of development processes (e.g ASPICE, version management, change management, reviews) Awareness of AD industry trends, technologies, competitive products, best practices (HW/SW) Experience in SOTIF analysis of Autonomous driving projects in System and/or SW level. Knowledge and/or experience in developing SW applications using Adaptive/Classic AUTOSAR Experience with Agile software engineering methodology Why youâ€™ll love work here. The exciting environment of a fast-paced AI technology startup. Opportunity to apply your knowledge and skills to make a real impact on the world. Compensation is competitive and will consider the applicantâ€™s current experience level. Opportunity to continuously grow your knowledge and your leadership skills. Opportunity to contribute, interact, share, and learn from exceptionally talented colleagues. Contact Interested applicants are invited to send your application to v.loantt27@vinai.io or v.hoangnm31@vinai.io

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Akselos is a fast-growing digital technology company delivering Structural Performance Management (SPM) to the worldâ€™s most critical energy and industrial assets. Headquartered in Europe with operations in South East Asia and the USA, we combine physics-based AI, high-fidelity structural twins, and real-time operational data to help operators run safer, more reliable, and more efficient facilities. Our technology allows customers to understand true structural behavior, prevent failures, extend asset life, and unlock higher throughput across Refining, Petrochemicals and offshore oil & Gas. Position Summary: As a Junior Software Developer at Akselos, you will contribute to the development of core features, tooling, and automation that power our Structural Performance Management (SPM) platform. Your work will span bug fixing, building robust test suites, and developing specialized scripts and utilities that support model configuration, data processing, and workflow automation. This role offers an excellent opportunity to deepen your software engineering skills while helping deliver advanced, physics-based AI solutions used across the global energy and industrial sectors. Essential Job Functions: Feature Development: Design and implement new features, tools, and components across the Akselos SPM platform, enhancing model configuration workflows, data handling, visualization, and overall user experience. Bug Fixing: Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve software issues to ensure high reliability, accuracy, and performance across the platform. Test Suite Management: Create, extend, and maintain comprehensive automated test suites to validate core functionality, simulation workflows, data pipelines, and various run-case scenarios. Automation & Scripting: Develop specialized scripts, APIs, and utilities to automate engineering and configuration processes - reducing manual effort and enabling faster, more consistent project delivery. Desired Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python , with the ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-structured code. Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and software design fundamentals. Working knowledge of web development technologies such as HTML, TypeScript, and modern web frameworks. Familiarity with version control systems (Git, Mercurial), including branching workflows and code review practices. Experience with Agile development practices (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) Familiar with developing using AI tools (Github Copilot, etc.) Desired Interpersonal & Professional Skills Strong command of English with the ability to communicate clearly in a distributed, multicultural environment. Excellent analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, especially when working with complex technical workflows. High aptitude for learning new technologies , tools, and engineering concepts quickly. Effective team collaboration skills, with the ability to work closely with developers, engineers, and domain experts across multiple continents and time zones. Bonus Skills & Experience Strong foundation in mathematics , including linear algebra, matrix computations, and spatial geometry. Experience with Rust programming is a plus. Experience with database management systems (SQL) and related data-handling workflows. Benefits: Competitive salary package including a 13-month salary. Performance-based bonuses. Full package of social and health insurance. Comprehensive advanced health insurance for you and your family. Annual premium medical check-ups at international hospitals. Parking subsidy together with free coffee in the office. Extra leave types: family care, bereavement, wedding, religious leaves, and more. Exciting employee engagement activities: company trips, team building, football, and badminton matches. Plenty of learning and development opportunities, including sponsorship for a second bachelorâ€™s or masterâ€™s degree, if qualified. A young and dynamic work environment with a supportive and collaborative team where you could learn and grow. How to apply: Please visit our Career Page: https://akselos.com/about/careers/ Application date from November 17th, 2025 Please also include a cover letter with your application Contact Information: Mrs. Minh-Ha Vu - Email: minhha.vu@akselos.com

location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
job_description: Job Description Manage end-to-end onboarding and offboarding processes, including Day 1 induction and exit formalities Act as a central point of contact for employee lifecycle queries and issue resolution Coordinate with HR, IT, Admin, and other teams for smooth transitions and process adherence Ensure accurate contracting processes and documentation such as labor contracts, movements, and termination decisions Maintain and manage employee records and personnel files digitally and physically, ensuring compliance with internal policies and labor laws Manage visa and work permit applications for expatriates and ensure timely procedures and legal requirements Handle Workday-related queries and provide system support for employees Initiate benefits programs for employees such as annual health checkup, mobile support top-up, business cards, awards, etc. Prepare reports, SOPs, and dashboards using MS Office tools for HR metrics and compliance Manage absence and benefits administration, ensuring timely updates and accuracy Prepare and submit reports to the Labor Department for legal compliance Support employee engagement initiatives, feedback collection, and action planning Manage vendor-related documentation and billing processes to ensure timely submission and compliance with internal policies Experience and good understanding of Social Security Fund and other insurance policies Qualifications Excellent communication skills in both English and Vietnamese (written and spoken) Demonstrated ability to manage a headcount of at least 400 employees Minimum of 2 yearsâ€™ experience as an HR Generalist Proficiency in HR systems (e.g., Workday) and MS Office tools for reporting and dashboards Strong understanding of employment law, contracting processes, and compliance requirements Core Competencies: Hands-on experience in managing end-to-end onboarding and offboarding processes Knowledge of visa and work permit procedures for expatriates Familiarity with Social Security Fund and insurance policies Additional Skills: Strong organisational and problem-solving skills Ability to coordinate across multiple teams (HR, IT, Admin) for smooth process execution Experience in vendor management and billing compliance Additional Information NIQ may utilize artificial intelligence (AI) tools at various stages of the recruitment process, including rÃ©sumÃ© screening, candidate assessments, interview scheduling, job matching, communication support, and certain administrative tasks that help streamline workflows. These tools are intended to improve efficiency and support fair and consistent evaluation based on job-related criteria. All use of AI is governed by NIQâ€™s principles of fairness, transparency, human oversight, and inclusion. Final hiring decisions are made exclusively by humans. NIQ regularly reviews its AI tools to help mitigate bias and ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations. If you have questions, require accommodations, or wish to request human review were permitted by law, please contact your local HR representative. For more information, please visit NIQâ€™s AI Safety Policies and Guiding Principles: https://www.nielseniq.com/global/en/ai-safety-policies. Our Benefits Flexible working environment Volunteer time off LinkedIn Learning Employee-Assistance-Program (EAP) About NIQ NIQ is the worldâ€™s leading consumer intelligence company, delivering the most complete understanding of consumer buying behavior and revealing new pathways to growth. In 2023, NIQ combined with GfK, bringing together the two industry leaders with unparalleled global reach. With a holistic retail read and the most comprehensive consumer insightsâ€”delivered with advanced analytics through state-of-the-art platformsâ€”NIQ delivers the Full Viewâ„¢. NIQ is an Advent International portfolio company with operations in 100+ markets, covering more than 90% of the worldâ€™s population. location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." Are you a product visionary with a deep understanding of Voice AI and a passion for creating seamless, intelligent user experiences? Do you have an innate customer empathy and a drive to solve complex problems from first principles? If you're ready to take extreme ownership and shape the future of voice technology, we want you on our team! How You'll Make an Impact As our Product Manager, you'll be instrumental in shaping the core of our user interactions by significantly advancing our voice technologies. You'll take full ownership of the product lifecycle for our ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) and TTS (Text-to-Speech) systems, from defining the strategic roadmap and identifying key customer needs to overseeing development and launch. What You'll Do Define and own the product vision, strategy, and roadmap for ASR and TTS technologies, aligning with overall company objectives. Conduct market research, competitive analysis, and customer discovery to identify unmet needs and opportunities within voice AI. Translate business goals and user needs into detailed product requirements and user stories for engineering and data science teams. Oversee the entire development lifecycle of ASR and TTS systems, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality implementation. Collaborate closely with engineering and data science teams to analyze performance metrics, troubleshoot issues, and drive technical improvements. Lead initiatives to drive innovations aimed at reducing error rates and latency in voice interactions, continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Manage iterative testing and quality enhancement processes for voice systems, ensuring robust and reliable performance. Maintain a strong understanding of emerging voice AI trends and technologies to keep our products at the cutting edge. Communicate product updates, performance, and strategic direction to various stakeholders across all organizational levels. What We're Looking For 5+ years of experience in Product Management, with a strong focus on Voice AI, Natural Language Processing (NLP), or Machine Learning (ML) technologies (specifically ASR/TTS). Demonstrated customer empathy, combined with a first-principles approach to problem-solving and a mindset of extreme ownership. Proven skills in improving ASR accuracy and TTS effectiveness, with an understanding of the underlying technical challenges. Extensive experience in iterative testing and quality enhancement of complex voice systems. Exceptional collaboration and communication skills. A strong focus on driving innovation to reduce error rates and latency in voice interactions, with a portfolio showcasing relevant achievements. Ability to define, articulate, and execute product strategy from concept to launch and iteration. Strong analytical skills and experience using data to inform product decisions and measure success. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Cognitive Science, or a related technical field. What We Offer Join Our Vibrant Team And Enjoy Competitive compensation, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses. Comprehensive health care for you and your dependents. Generous leave policies and flexible work hours. Convenient District 1 office location (next to the metro station). On-site lunch, Grab for work allowance, and fully equipped workstations. Fun team-building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and Thursday happy hours. Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit. A chance to make a profound social impact by democratizing credit access in emerging markets. At Trusting Social, we live by extreme ownership, data-driven decisions, mindfulness, and audacity. We're committed to doing what's right, best, and truly innovative. If you're smart, driven, and want to make a difference with advanced technology, join us. We offer the runway to truly make an impact. For more information about us, please visit our website: https://trustingsocial.com

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Summary: We are looking for a visionary Product Engineer that is passionate about using AI for product development. They must have a strong foundation in backend engineering, capable of building and integrating frontend systems, backend systems, customer service portals, and operations portals using AI tools. In this role, you will be at the forefront of adopting an AI-first approach to product development, continually challenging existing workflows and foundational engineering principles, while engaging in rapid experimentation to enhance value delivery to customers. This is an exciting opportunity for those passionate about product development and AI-driven workflows. Top 5 Reasons Why We Are the Next Destination for Your Career Innovation-Driven Environment: Work with state-of-the-art technologies, including Serverless AWS, AI-driven engineering, Java, and Python Impactful Work: Shape products that enhance financial inclusivity and access in emerging markets Collaborative Culture: Join a forward-thinking team that values innovation, teamwork, and continuous learning Competitive Benefits: Enjoy a comprehensive package, professional growth opportunities, and a balanced work-life environment Learning and Growth: Access SMART goals, technical seminars, conferences, and training to support your career advancement Key Responsibilities: Take the lead with AI-first adoption, leveraging AI tools and prompt engineering skills to automate work wherever possible so that we can improve time-to-value "Question the requirements", to get to the essence of what is actually needed, ensuring that we are building the right things right Collaborate with a new, AI-first product development team where you'll be at the heart of building and scaling innovative enterprise financial products, driving meaningful impact from day one Take end-to-end ownership of the product, designing systems to satisfy customers and validating assumptions with data driven insights Innovate like a startupâ€”lead the charge from concept to deployment, continuously testing, learning, and improving your product with every iteration Embrace the full product lifecycle; prioritise it, define it, design it, build it, test it, run it and own it Requirements Must-have skills Backend engineering experience: at least 5 years of backend engineering experience in one or more programming languages (Python, Java) Team Leadership: at least 1 year of experience in leading teams or projects, including mentoring, code reviews, and owning delivery Experience with Prompt/Context Engineering is preferred or demonstrate self-learning Prompt/Context Engineering System Architecture Design: Strong experience in designing and implementing system architectures, including defining technical solutions and making high-level design decisions AI Tools: Proficient with Claude Code, or other autonomous capable coding agent. Comfortable integrating AI tools into the development workflow Product-obsessed: You live and breathe product thinkingâ€”you're not just here to generate code, but to own the product and drive its success. You focus on solving customer problems and delivering experiences that make a difference Customer focussed: You can talk to directly customers or subject matter experts and ask questions to deeply understand their needs so that you can deliver products that resonate Creative problem-solver: You tackle complex challenges with creativity and an analytical mindset, always balancing technical decisions with business outcomes Adaptability & hustle: You thrive in an ever-evolving environment, where you can wear many hats, pivot quickly, and move fast without losing focus on the big picture Team player with an edge: You bring a strong collaborative spirit to an AI-first team, but you're also ready to lead initiatives and be the go-to person for the features you own Fluent in English: You're a smooth communicator, capable of turning technical jargon into easy-to-understand ideas for both teammates and stakeholders Automation lover: You believe in the power of automated testing frameworks to build robust and reliable systems Love for Learning: You love learning new domains of knowledge and technologies so that you can build better products faster. You know there is always more to learn and are always open to being wrong Early Adopter: You have already built a few simple apps with AI tools, experimented with mcp servers and are familiar with prompt/context engineering Nice to Have: Understanding of System Thinking Experience with Behaviour Driven Development Avid Reader Benefits At TYME, opportunities are here for the taking. If you want to be part of our purpose and live and lead through our values, we can offer exciting development opportunities through expanded lateral roles, stretch assignments, or people leadership. Some of our benefits: Meal and parking allowances are covered by the company Full benefits and salary rank during probation Insurances such as Vietnamese labor law and premium health care for you and your family SMART goals and clear career opportunities (technical seminar, conference, and career talk) - we focus on your development Values-driven, international working environment, and agile culture Overseas travel opportunities for training and work-related Internal Hackathons and company events (team building, coffee run, etc.) Pro-Rate and performance bonus 15-day annual + 3-day sick leave per year from the company Work-life balance 40-hr per week from Mon to Fri

job_title: Product Manager â€“ Customer Insights AI
location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: We are an AI Fintech company specializing in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets, combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020, we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1bn consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry, in particular, to provide the 'un & under' served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights. But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in our markets. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at an unprecedented scale. As a firm, we're audacious problem solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do, and agility in execution. We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best, and what is innovative. And we seek people to champion these values and beliefs as we grow. Come join our team if you are smart, driven, and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to make big impacts. How You Will Make An Impact In This Role You will leverage AI capabilities to generate deep consumer insights, informing strategic customer contact and service improvements. By developing AI-driven consumer profile analysis, you will provide actionable insights that enhance decision-making processes. Your contributions will ensure that Kompato's strategies are data-driven and aligned with compliance standards. Responsibilities Leverage AI capabilities to generate deep consumer insights for strategic improvements. Develop and prioritize enhancements for AI-driven consumer profile analysis and ranking. Drive the creation of actionable insights to improve next-contact decision-making. Work closely with analytics and engineering teams to enhance consumer data interpretation. Requirements Customer empathy, first principle problem solving, and extreme ownership. Ability to generate actionable insights from consumer profiles. Skills in integrating insights into decision-making processes. Experience in developing and prioritizing enhancements for AI-driven consumer profile analysis. Ability to drive the creation of actionable insights for next-contact decision-making. Collaboration skills to work closely with analytics and engineering teams. What We Offer Join our team and enjoy: Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses Comprehensive health care coverage for you and your dependents Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours Convenient central district 1 office location, next to the metro station On-site lunch with multiple options, including vegetarian Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations Fun and engaging team-building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized An opportunity to make a social impact by helping to democratize credit access in emerging markets About Us Trusting Social, an AI Fintech pioneer, assessed 1bn consumers across 4 countries, revolutionizing credit access. Our unwavering commitment to consumer data rights drives our journey to provide 100 million credit lines in emerging markets. With AI & Big Data, we aim to deliver unprecedented financial access. As audacious problem solvers, we champion ownership, integrity, and innovation. Join us if you're driven to impact society, embracing advanced technology to make a difference. We offer a platform for exploration and impactful contributions. If you're ready to innovate and drive change, come be a part of our team. For more information about us, please visit our website https://trustingsocial.com

job_title: [Q.3, HCM] AI/ML Developer >2 years exp + English communication
location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description: Working location: District 3, HCMC Salary range: Up to 45mil Job Description Algorithm Development - Design, build, and optimize machine learning algorithms and models for various HR-related applications, such as candidate screening, talent matching, performance prediction, and sentiment analysis. Cloud Infrastructure - Architect, develop, and deploy AI-related cloud infrastructure and services on platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform. This includes setting up and managing data pipelines, model serving endpoints, and scalable computing resources. Full Lifecycle Development - Take ownership of the entire machine learning lifecycle, from initial data exploration and feature engineering to model training, evaluation, and deployment in a production environment. Collaboration - Work closely with product managers, data scientists, and other software engineers to understand business requirements, translate them into technical specifications, and deliver high-quality, impactful solutions. Performance & Optimization - Monitor the performance of deployed models, troubleshoot issues, and continuously improve algorithms to enhance accuracy and efficiency. Research & Innovation - Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and cloud technologies. Propose and experiment with new tools and techniques to keep our products at the forefront of the industry. Code Quality - Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code, adhering to best practices in software development Job requirement 2+ years of professional hands-on experience as an AI Developer, Machine Learning Engineer, or similar role. Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, or GCP) and related services (e.g., S3, EC2, Lambda, SageMaker, Google AI Platform) Solid understanding of machine learning principles, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Strong programming skills in implementing programs using Python . Development experience with database technologies (SQL and NoSQL) and relational databases Development experience using git, Jupyter notebook, and cloud Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Experienced growth in business using data AI Experience with project leads with multiple members Fluent English Benefits Bonus: 13th Salary Salary Review (Twice a Year) Hybrid working & flexible working time) Social Insurance with full salary Travel Allowance Premium Health Care (PTI Insurance) 15th Annual Leave Device Full Provide Improve Skill Course (Udemy) Happy Hour, Company Trip, Year End Party and Events Marriage / Baby Gift Funeral Expenses Referral Bonus Annual Health Check Career Path for members

location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
job_description: Job Description About this role As a Staff Full Stack AI Engineer, you will lead the design, development, and deployment of end-to-end AI/ML applications, including scalable front-end interfaces and robust back-end systems. About Our Team At Renesas, our Global AI, Data & Analytics Department is dedicated to enhancing productivity across the company by leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies, including Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). We work closely with business partners to deliver impactful AI-driven solutions that create value at a global enterprise scale. We are seeking passionate individuals who thrive in a collaborative, global team of technologists. Ideal candidates are excited about empowering internal customers, working with teammates across regions, and applying the latest advancements in AI and data technologies. Responsibilities Lead UI and backend development for AI tool development projects. Build and enhance user interfaces and experiences for AI solutions, including front-end and back-end systems and deploying complete applications. Develop and maintain full stack AI/ML applications using Databricks tools and frameworks. Collaborate with data scientists and AI/ML engineers, and domain experts on cross-functional projects using Databricks Workspaces. Keep up to date with the latest developments and trends in AI/ML applications and Databricks technologies. Qualifications Must have : Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, engineering, or a related field. 8-12 years of full-time work experience. Experience with web development frameworks and tools, such as React, Angular, Bootstrap, etc for AI applications. Proficient in Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js or other programming languages for full stack AI/ML development. Experience working with APIs Strong familiarity developing with Databricks products and services Have working knowledge of CI/CD. Strong communication, documentation, and white-boarding skills. Passionate about creating innovative and impactful AI/ML solutions. Business-level proficiency in English (written and spoken). Strongly Preferred Databricks certifications. Experience in developing and deploying full stack AI/ML applications using Databricks products and services. Knowledge of AI/ML frameworks and libraries, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc. Working knowledge of at least one major cloud ecosystem (AWS, Azure, or GCP). Azure certifications. Knowledge in LLM actual use cases. Experience working with a geographically distributed and cross-functional team including systems integrators and third-party companies. Additional Information We have adopted a hybrid model that gives employees the ability to work remotely two days a week while ensuring that we come together as a team in the office the rest of the time. The designated in-office days are Tuesday through Thursday for innovation, collaboration and continuous learning. Renesas is an embedded semiconductor solution provider driven by its Purpose â€˜ To Make Our Lives Easier .â€™ As the industryâ€™s leading expert in embedded processing with unmatched quality and system-level know-how, we have evolved to provide scalable and comprehensive semiconductor solutions for automotive, industrial, infrastructure, and IoT industries based on the broadest product portfolio, including High Performance Computing, Embedded Processing, Analog & Connectivity, and Power. With a diverse team of over 21,000 professionals in more than 30 countries, we continue to expand our boundaries to offer enhanced user experiences through digitalization and usher into a new era of innovation. We design and develop sustainable, power-efficient solutions today that help people and communities thrive tomorrow, â€˜ To Make Our Lives Easier .â€™ At Renesas, You Can Launch and advance your career in technical and business roles across four Product Groups and various corporate functions. You will have the opportunities to explore our hardware and software capabilities and try new things. Make a real impact by developing innovative products and solutions to meet our global customers' evolving needs and help make peopleâ€™s lives easier, safe and secure. Maximize your performance and wellbeing in our flexible and inclusive work environment. Our people-first culture and global support system, including the remote work option and Employee Resource Groups, will help you excel from the first day. Are you ready to own your success and make your mark? Join Renesas. Letâ€™s Shape the Future together. Renesas Electronics is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer, committed to supporting diversity and fostering a work environment free of discrimination on the basis of sex, race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, sexual orientation, military status, veteran status, or any other basis protected by law. For more information, please read our Diversity & Inclusion Statement. We have adopted a hybrid model that gives employees the ability to work remotely two days a week while ensuring that we come together as a team in the office the rest of the time. The designated in-office days are Tuesday through Thursday for innovation, collaboration and continuous learning.
